page.title: 20SAINTFIELD CLUBS
page.content: There are many clubs and organisations for children and adults.For children there are Scouts,Guides, the Boys' and Girls' Brigades,and youth clubs. There is involvement in such charities as Christian Aid,U.S.P.C.A., U.S.P.C.C.,Dr.Barnardo's and the Save The Children Fund.The Primary 6 class in our school-{SAINTFIELD ACADEMY}-won this year's N.I. group section of the {Princess Anne Award}for commitment to the S.C.F..Some of us travelled to Glames Castle near Dundee in Scotland to receive the award and to have a buffet lunch with the princess who is president of the Fund.
